features: ☀️【360°Ultra Bright】LUYATA LED garage light can provide the best indoor lighting experience. With 6+1 deformable panels, super brighter 16000LM 160W and 90% energy saving LED garage lights provide color rendering index >80Ra, stable, no flickering 6000K to 6500K cool white light turn your dark garage to daytime.

☀️【Deformable Panels Design】The 2 pack 160W LED garage light With 5+1 adjustable LED panels, each LED panel can be adjusted from 0°to 90°according to your needs, the max coverage angle can be reached 360°, which makes the light cover a large and wide luminous area, no dark area and glare, soft brightness, eye -care.Let's say good bye to lighting dead spot!

☀️【High Quality】LUYATA garage light is made of Plastic which is high temperature resistant and corrosion resistant. each panel features Hollow-out design that make a efficient heat dissipation, offer a greater brightness and lower temperature to make sure the light long last enough to 50,000 hours. our LED garage light is more energy saving than traditional.

☀️【30s Fast Install】Our Deformable LED ceiling light for garage uses E26/E27 base same as the LED bulb. No tools or wiring required, just need to align the E26 screw and rotate it right. Wide application fit for garage, patio, basement, warehouses, workshop, exhibition hall, sports hall, mining, supermarkets, parking lot, gym, barn, workbench, bay, laundry room, closet, etc.

☀️【Safety & Energy Saving】This Energy Efficient Basement Lighting uses high quality motherboard and high quality LED light to make, not only provide enough brightness, but also reduce power consumption by 85%. LUYATA garage light is your first choice for energy-saving LED lights! LUYATA is a trusted lighting brand, in addition to leading product technology, we also provide professional after-sales service and You will have a 12-month after-sales guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: So, I got these two new super-bright LED lights for my place. Installing them was a bit tricky, not gonna lie, but once I got them up, it felt like I'd unlocked a whole new level of lighting.These lights are like the superheroes of brightness – they light up my shop like it's daytime even when it's pitch dark outside.And the best part? They're like the overachievers of light bulbs. They do their job flawlessly, no flickering or weird stuff. It's like having your own personal lighting crew making sure everything looks awesome.Yeah, setting them up was a bit of a puzzle, had to rewire my shop a little, but now that they're shining bright, it's clear they're the MVPs of my home lighting situation. Bright, hassle-free, and making my place look way cooler than before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pleasant surprise ... at least so far
reviews.reviewText: I was a little hesitant to buy something cheap from China, but a friend had bought a pair of these and liked them. There really was no installation to speak of. It's just like screwing in a light bulb. The light output is great, and the light is a very bright white, which throws distinct shadows. Perfect for my garage work. I also like the adjustable arms that allow me to direct the majority of the light where I need it most in the garage. Hard to comment on the longevity at this early stage, but so far I'm very pleased, and the price was certainly reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and easy to install if replacing existing bulbs
reviews.reviewText: Very Bright! Easy to install. They must be durable because the shipper marked on the box that it was damaged when they picked it up. It was smashed pretty well but everything worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots Of Light for the Money
reviews.reviewText: Longevity remains to be seen.Very bright, white light.The listed numbers for wattage, 160w and 16k lumens are not very useful.Not even for the 2 fixtures combined.A watt meter tells me one of these is pulling about 53w at the wall which means it could have the lighting capability of 2 or more 150w Incandescent bulbs.I don't have any way to measure lumens, but a 5.2k number does not seem out of line based on the wattage comparison for incandescent bulbs.There is not a lot of heat based on the amount of light I am seeing. 10w incandescent bulbs are hotter than this.The panels are made from very heavy gauge plastic and are well put together.Pay attention to the measurements. They are no where near the size they appear to be in the garage and shop illustrations. I don't see that as a problem, as the performance is still very good for the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lights are very bright and just what I needed to brighten up the dark corners of my garage. The included light sockets didn’t work for me because I needed something that would mount to an existing electrical box, the included ones did not so I had to purchase ones that did. Also be careful screwing them in the socket, the threads are very thin/soft and easily damaged but they are bright!! Longevity remains to be seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Brightened up our garage..simply screw into the light socket and you're ready to go. Did have one go out after 6 months, contacted seller and they sent a replacement even though it was after warranty period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These lights really brighten up the garage. Easy to install in the existing light socket. Great quality for the price.
